definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
to shake/to vibrate/to jolt/to quake/excited/shocked/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing thunder/☳
Poland/Polish/abbr. for 波蘭|波兰[Bo1 lan2]

sentences.english: This earthquake affected several cities in the vicinity.
sentences.chinese: 這次地震波及周圍幾個城市。

sentences.english: Both data and synthetic seismograms are aligned on the P or SH arrivals.
sentences.chinese: 數據和人工地震波都與抵達的P波或SH波同步。

sentences.english: The single dimensional Time-History analysis results are contrasted in the different seismic waves.
sentences.chinese: 對比了不同地震波下結構單維時程分析結果。

sentences.english: The parameters of explosive seismic wave were measured by piezocrystal gages.
sentences.chinese: 用壓電晶體探頭測量了爆炸時的地震波參數。

sentences.english: The wideangle data were used to construct a crustal seismic-velocity model down to the MHT.
sentences.chinese: 寬角數據用於建立地表到MHT的地震波速度模型。

sentences.english: Apparent velocity and polarization are important characters of seis- mic wave.
sentences.chinese: 視速度和偏振是地震波的兩個重要特性。

sentences.english: This lays a foundation for the traveltime and velocity analysis of reflective seismic waves.
sentences.chinese: 這爲反射地震波的旅行時及速度分析提供了基礎。

sentences.english: The amplitudes of the blasting seismic waves under the conditions of the different sizes of the quake insulation groove are measured.
sentences.chinese: 觀測了不同隔震溝尺寸條件下爆破地震波的幅值。

sentences.english: The high frequency part of seismic wave propagation in subsurface is easy to be absorbed or attenuated.
sentences.chinese: 地震波在地下介質中傳播時，高頻成分易被吸收。

sentences.english: The two-dimensional Time-History analysis results are contrasted in the different seismic waves.
sentences.chinese: 對比了不同地震波下結構雙維時程分析結果。

sentences.english: Both data and synthetic seismograms are aligned with the earthquake origin time.
sentences.chinese: 數據和人工地震波都與地震起始時間同步。

sentences.english: Such a phenomenon has enlightened us on the precursory anomaly of the observed wave characteristics.
sentences.chinese: 這種現象，爲觀測地震波特性的前兆異常給予了啓示。

sentences.english: The directions of seismic wave have no effect on pseudo-static displacement.
sentences.chinese: 地震波的傳播方向對擬靜力位移分佈規律沒有影響。

definition: earthquake intensity (measure of its destructive power)
